name: AVCaptureMovieFileOutput
desc: A capture output that records video and audio to a QuickTime movie file.

items.name: movieFragmentInterval
items.desc: The number of seconds of output that are written per fragment.

items.name: metadata
items.desc: The metadata for the output file.

items.name: supportedOutputSettingsKeys
items.desc: The list of supported keys for the output settings dictionary.

items.name: outputSettings
items.desc: Returns the options used to reencode media from a given connection as it's being recorded.

items.name: setOutputSettings
items.desc: Sets the options dictionary used to reencode media from the given connection as it's being recorded.

items.name: availableVideoCodecTypes
items.desc: The video codec types currently supported for recording movie files.

items.name: recordsVideoOrientationAndMirroringChangesAsMetadataTrack
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the capture device records video orientation.

items.name: setRecordsVideoOrientationAndMirroringChangesAsMetadataTrack
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the capture device sets video orientation.
